00064 class ODFLACFile : public FLAC::Decoder::File
00065 {
00066  public:
00067    ODFLACFile(ODFlacDecoder *decoder) : mDecoder(decoder)
00068    {
00069       mWasError = false;
00070       set_metadata_ignore_all();
00071       set_metadata_respond(FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_VORBIS_COMMENT);
00072       set_metadata_respond(FLAC__METADATA_TYPE_STREAMINFO);
00073    }
00074    
00075    bool get_was_error() const
00076    {
00077       return mWasError;
00078    }
00079  private:
00080    friend class ODFlacDecoder;
00081    ODFlacDecoder *mDecoder;
00082    bool                  mWasError;
00083    wxArrayString         mComments;
00084    
00085  protected:
00086    virtual FLAC__StreamDecoderWriteStatus write_callback(const FLAC__Frame *frame,
00087                       const FLAC__int32 * const buffer[]);
00088    virtual void metadata_callback(const FLAC__StreamMetadata *metadata);
00089    virtual void error_callback(FLAC__StreamDecoderErrorStatus status);
00090 };
